title: Dueling
context: [ยง124A-147] Dueling. Any person subject to this chapter who fights or promotes, or is concerned in or connives at fighting a duel, or who, having knowledge of a challenge sent or about to be sent, fails to report the fact promptly to the proper authority, shall be punished as a court-martial may direct. [L 1982, c 171, pt of ยง2]
